name: standard_analysis_v1
description: Standard 9-round analysis pipeline for political content

variables.focus_area_1: Framing: How the story is presented and what perspective is centered
variables.focus_area_2: Language: Use of emotionally charged language, loaded terms, or persuasive devices
variables.focus_area_3: Omissions: What relevant context or counterpoints are excluded
variables.focus_area_4: Attribution: Whether claims are properly sourced and attributed
variables.focus_area_5: Fact/Opinion Blending: How facts are mixed with analysis or opinion
variables.analysis_instruction: Be balanced and objective. Do not overinterpret ambiguous statements, but don't overlook concerning patterns.
variables.entity_types: actor, institution, policy, event, media_outlet, civil_society, narrative, legal_framework, procedural_norm
variables.relation_types: part_of, influences, opposes, supports, restricts, undermines, authorizes, co-opts, purges, criminalizes, censors, intimidates, delegitimizes, backs_with_force, justifies, expands_power, normalizes, diverts_attention, targets
variables.json_instruction: Your response MUST be a valid, parseable JSON object. Do not include any text before or after the JSON.
variables.manipulation_scale: Where 1 = highly objective news with minimal manipulation and 10 = extreme manipulation with significant distortion of facts
